entries.femaleVariant: No, Cindy. "Little Big Corporats" was a bold concept from the get-go.
Maybe too bold for more... delicate tastes?
"Delicate" tastes? Wha-what is that supposed to mean, Carl?
I mean, target audience is clearly male.
"Degrades." Yeah. Good one. That's gotta be the draw.
Not what I meant. You know what I meant. I am not the oppressor here.
Cindy, the show degrades all of us equally. It drags us down, right into the gutter.
And THAT'S the big, I mean, little lesson "Little Big Corporats" has to offer us.
But even there, one can find dignity, one can stand, ahem... tall.
